Key.English: Hide Auto-Hover On action
Hides the Auto-Hover On entry from the action menu.\nRequires a game restart.
Hide Auto-Hover Off action
Hides the Auto-Hover Off entry from the action menu.\nRequires a game restart.
Hide Assemble action
Hides the Assemble entry from the action menu.\nRequires a game restart.
Hide Release UAV controls action
Hides the Release UAV controls entry from the action menu.\nRequires a game restart.
Hide Landing autopilot off action
Hides the Landing autopilot off entry from the action menu.\nRequires a game restart.
Hide Collision lights off action
Hides the Collision lights off entry from the action menu.\nRequires a game restart.
Hide Collision lights on action
Hides the Collision lights on entry from the action menu.\nRequires a game restart.
Hide Disassemble action
Hides the Disassemble entry from the action menu.\nRequires a game restart.

Hides the Engine on entry from the action menu.\nRequires a game restart.

Hide Lights on action
Hides the Lights on entry from the action menu.\nRequires a game restart.
Hide Reload action (unloaded weapon)
Hides the Reload entry from the action menu when the weapon is unloaded.\nRequires a game restart. WARNING: THIS SETTING AFFECTS VEHICLES TOO.
Hide Reload action (loaded weapon)
Hides the Reload entry from the action menu when the weapon is loaded.\nRequires a game restart. WARNING: THIS SETTING AFFECTS VEHICLES TOO.

Hides the Lock controls entry from the action menu.\nRequires a game restart.

Hides the Cancel manual fire entry from the action menu.\nRequires a game restart.

Hides the Take entry from the action menu when you have a weapon already.\nRequires a game restart.
